definition: a device (generally used by carpenters) that holds things firmly together, to impose or inflict forcefully
details:
noun
- a device (generally used by carpenters) that holds things firmly together
= synonyms: clinch
verb
- to impose or inflict forcefully
= example: to impose or inflict forcefully
- to fasten or fix with a clamp
= example: to fasten or fix with a clamp
